entries.name: Verdant Crown
entries.description: Said to bloom once more when the lost Warden returns. Grants dominion over wild growth.

entries.name: Salt Mirror
entries.description: Reflects not your face but your fate. Shatters only under a vow betrayed.

entries.name: Ember Coil
entries.description: A twisted ring of burnt copper and coal. Whispers fragments of pre-Ash languages.
